## Web3sdkioProviderProps.dAppMeta property

Metadata to pass to wallet connect and walletlink wallet connect. (Used to show \*which\* dApp is being connected to in mobile wallets that support it) Defaults to just the name being passed as `web3sdkio powered dApp`.

**Signature:**

```typescript
dAppMeta?: DAppMetaData;
```
